content: So I've got the KEF through Best Buy. and the Fosi through Amazon. Yeah, if you have recommendations on plugs that'd be great and cables that would be great. I want to get it set up just the way you want it. I usually opt for white, but was thinking walnut for the speakers. What do you think? Also, for connection to machine, let me know if you want cabled and what cables if so or bluetooth for AI FIRST quality!
